Articles.Content: I deleted the parts in the game Data folder I want to player please give me a download to it. I really need help with that.

Steam? Verify Integrity of files.

If you removed some of your mods by mistake... you'll have to figure out which ones and reinstall

On 6/2/2024 at 8:21 AM, TNTDoggo14 said:

I deleted the parts in the game Data folder I want to player please give me a download to it. I really need help with that.

Moved to tech support.  
 

It is not allowed to share original Squad files on the forums, as it is technically a form of piracy.    If you have a legitimately owned copy of ksp, then just make a back up of any mods or saves, and do a reinstall.   If you have the game through steam, as mentioned above, you can just verify the integrity.
